name: list_modules_terse
purpose: Lists all loaded modules in terse format with module names and base addresses.

name: verifier_status
purpose: Displays Driver Verifier status and settings, showing which drivers are being verified.

name: driver_object_info
purpose: Shows detailed information about a specific driver object including dispatch routines and device objects.

name: show_all_stacks
purpose: Displays call stacks for all threads in the system, useful for identifying hung or problematic threads.

name: show_stack_verbose
purpose: Displays the call stack with verbose details including parameters and local variables.

name: show_irql
purpose: Shows the current Interrupt Request Level (IRQL) for each processor in the system.

name: list_module_verbose
purpose: Lists verbose information about a specific module including version, timestamp, and file details.

name: show_pool_usage
purpose: Summarizes kernel pool memory usage by tag, identifying potential memory leaks or excessive consumption.

name: analyze_memory_address
purpose: Analyzes a specific memory address, showing its type, protection, and associated memory region information.
